titleStmt.title: The non-pareil, or, The vertuous daughter surmounting all her sisters described in a funerall sermon upon the death of that vertuous lady, Elizabeth Hoyle, late wife of the worshipfull Thomas Hoyle, alderman of the city of Yorke / by that godly and reverend divine, Mr. Iohn Birchall ...
titleStmt.author: Birchall, John.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
"An elegie upon the ... death of ... Elizabeth Hoyle" has special t.p.
